meanings.definition: The act of printing a book or other publication again.
meanings.sent1: The reimpression of the book sold out quickly.
meanings.sent2: The publisher decided to do a reimpression of the novel due to high demand.
meanings.sent3: The librarian accidentally ordered a reimpression of the wrong book!
meanings.sent4: The reimpression of the classic novel breathed new life into the story.
meanings.sent5: The vivid reimpression of the illustrations made the book even more appealing.

meanings.definition: A new printing of a book or other publication.
meanings.sent1: The bookstore received the reimpression of the bestseller yesterday.
meanings.sent2: I bought the reimpression of my favorite novel to add to my collection.
meanings.sent3: The students were excited to see the reimpression of their textbook with updated content.
meanings.sent4: The reimpression of the magazine featured a striking new cover design.
meanings.sent5: The quality of the reimpression made the book look brand new.
